s = list(input())
n = len(s)

odds = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [s[i] for i in range(n) if i % 2 == 1]
if all(x in ['R', 'U', 'D'] for x in odds) and all(x in ['L', 'U', 'D'] for x in evens):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")


s = input()

if (len(s) % 2 == 0) and (s[0] in 'RUD') and (s[-1] in 'LUD'):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')


s = input()

if (len(s) % 2 == 0) and (s[0] in 'UD') and (s[-1] in 'UD'):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

s = input()

n = len(s)

odds = [int(x) for i, x in enumerate(s) if i % 2 == 0]
evens = [int(x) for i, x in enumerate(s) if i % 2 == 1]

print(sum(odds) * sum(evens))
